title: Upper Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 6 Days
description: Journey to the forbidden kingdom of Upper Mustang, a restricted area that preserves ancient Tibetan culture and traditions. Explore medieval cities, ancient monasteries, and dramatic desert landscapes.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Pokhara, then scenic mountain flight to Jomsom. Arrive in the apple capital of Nepal. Explore Jomsom town and visit local monastery. Overnight in Jomsom.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through the Kali Gandaki valley to Charang. Visit the impressive Charang monastery with ancient murals. Continue to Lo Manthang, the walled capital of former Mustang kingdom.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Lo Manthang's medieval architecture. Visit Jampa Gompa (15th century), Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Meet with local Loba people and experience their unique culture.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Ghar Gompa to Ghami
itinerary.description: Visit ancient Ghar Gompa and explore mysterious sky caves. Drive to Ghami village via different route. See the longest mani wall in Nepal and stay overnight in traditional guesthouse.

itinerary.title: Ghami to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom through scenic Mustang landscapes. Stop at Samar village and Chele. Enjoy last evening in Mustang with mountain views and local hospitality.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with spectacular Annapurna and Dhaulagiri views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or extend stay in Pokhara.

fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required for high altitude activities.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 21 days before departure
